description: Dian Rubens is an alchemist, who is in the process of chronicling pagan tales and beliefs so as to print them in books. She also carries information about Horo`s birthplace Yoitsu. According to Horo, Dianna is not human, but a bird even bigger than Lawrence. She fell in love with a traveling priest and spent a few years helping him build a church but left because he noticed that she never seemed to grow old and became suspicious.
name: Dian Rubens
